channel.title: CharlieCraft [Hardcore PVP] [130 Slots] [Factions] [Survival] and much more
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Looking for a server, to battle with your friends and survive the harsh nights of minecraft?[/size] [img]http://cdn.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1225/MainPicMaybe_2626360.jpg[/img] [size=18pt]Then this is the server for you![/size]
[size=24pt]176.31.208.34[/size] [size=18pt] PVP Factions MCMMO NoCheat TeamSpeak 3 130 Slots[/size]
[size=18pt]These are just some of the great features of CharlieCraft, as well as the helpful and friendly admins, Lots of room for new players, and a brand new landscape where you can build anywhere but spawn !! :D[/size]
[size=18pt]What are you waiting for? Join Today![/size] [size=24pt] 176.31.208.34[/size][/center]
